name: Deleting Heart
description:
Hello!

Life is complicated, isn't it? Pity there isn't another option. So... I'm going to play this dating game and try to forget for a while.

Forget with me?

The Game

Deleting Heart is a full-length visual novel about one woman seeking escapism from her messy life, and facing that life when escapism betrays her.

It is a story containing sensitive subjects and isn't intended for minors or those who may be sensitive to traumatic topics. 

The full game is a few hours long, based on the player.

We're releasing our story for free because, honestly, it isn't about income. We wished to see if we could create a finished project and tell (mostly) coherent story. 

We hope you find it in some way impactful, even if you dislike it, because we will love you anyway.

For now, Deleting Heart is available for Windows. Other platforms may be forthcoming. Or not. Or so?
